name: The Hex Collection
description:
an experiment in game design, not meant to be a solid game, but more an interactive way to listen to my music, I got tired of releasing cds and albums all the time!

Hope you like it, to get in touch hit up

www.ruune.net

::edits:: since this is an HTML5 game, (and my first ever HTML5 game to be exact) some of the aspects will run differently on different computers and different browsers. If this game doesn't 100% work for you I am sorry! Learned a lot about this stuff to put towards my next game :)

2) if you want the mp3s, keep an eye out for "Ruune" on spotify, or email me for the mp3s! ruunemagick@gmail.com

3) if it gets to be too much with the enemies, just fly towards the sky!

if you like this, or any other of my work scattered around the internet, consider subscribing to my PATREON
